blocks.block_text: Bandyopadhyay . Mehanad Saha and Satyen Bose unstintingly . Jyotirmoyee Devi's centenary seems to need a " special pleading " from feminists . This is as it should be . From within the four walls that seemed to preserve the purity of upper caste Hindu orthodoxy . Jyotirmoyee Devi's pen relentlessly exposed the systemic violation of human rights in the humiliation dished out to its women by the socially acceptable practices of Hindu orthodox society . Her protests are not flawed by any paranoid edge . She achieves it with her rare ability to blend her defence of the marginal and destitute women with a clear headed understanding of the working of the " public domain " , that is history and politics . In Jyotirmoyee Devi's writings , not only is the " personal " , " political " ; the " political " is also etched with the conviction of the " personal " .
lines: Bandyopadhyay . Mehanad Saha and Satyen Bose unstintingly . Jyotirmoyee Devi's centenary seems to need a " special pleading " from feminists . This is as it should be . From within the four walls that seemed to preserve the purity of upper caste Hindu orthodoxy . Jyotirmoyee Devi's pen relentlessly exposed the systemic violation of human rights in the humiliation dished out to its women by the socially acceptable practices of Hindu orthodox society . Her protests are not flawed by any paranoid edge . She achieves it with her rare ability to blend her defence of the marginal and destitute women with a clear headed understanding of the working of the " public domain " , that is history and politics . In Jyotirmoyee Devi's writings , not only is the " personal " , " political " ; the " political " is also etched with the conviction of the " personal " .
